DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare 2 fixed combination medication intraocular pressure lowering .
DOC.detailed_description: PURPOSE : To compare efficacy bimatoprost/timolol ( BTFC ) travoprost/timolol ( TTFC ) fix combination intraocular pressure ( IOP ) reduction Egyptian population . METHODS : Patients primary open angle glaucoma ( POAG ) randomize receive either BTFC TTFC . IOPs measure baseline , 2 week , 1 , 2 , 4 , 6 month . The primary outcome measure mean change IOP baseline
